content: Savings CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 18 Sep 2019I have a full-time job and driving PHV and taxi as well. How do I declare my income earned through PHV and taxi?What and how should I file the income tax? If my full-time job per annum is 50k, then how should I include my side income/freelance income like PHV and taxi?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 18 Sep 2019You will need to declare your side income to IRAS when filing your income tax.If your company you are working for your day job files for you, you will need to log in to IRAS portal to update with the side income amount. Very likely you will be asked to contribute to your Medisave CPF account after you receive your notice.Hope this helps.0 comments0
